findings.details: Pagination links lacked a strong focus-visible treatment, reducing keyboard visibility on mobile and desktop.

findings.result: No issues detected in code scan
findings.details: Reviewed static templates and recent posts for placeholder links and http:// usage; none found.
SEO tags, descriptions, and keywords are present across layouts and pages.
Homepage and post layouts are well-structured; minor focus styling gap in pagination addressed.

recommendations: Add visible focus treatment for pagination links to improve keyboard navigation.
